text: I found this Gem of a place from yelp I go everyday for my breakfast the staff owners are simply the best home feeling place  it's a winner
Fabulous all day breakfast, great lunches and superb fish and chips, with friendly family service.
My wife and I had there fish and chips, it was excellent and the staff were great, need to go back and try the breakfast and the burgers.
Great food all around!  I had breakfast there last and it was a great meal.  Standard greasy-spoon style restaurant.  Even the police were there eating.
